entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending before morning then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
